Address.Address1: LOITA STREET & UHURU HWY PO BOX 57549-00200

Description.Text: This grand 5 star deluxe hotel has a central atrium, at the base of which is well maintained plant gardens. The hotel has a heated swimming pool with shaded and sun bathing area, health club, beauty salon, a wide choice of shops, and meeting facilities and a casino. (RO 04.10)
The hotel is located in the heart of Nairobi's business and shopping district, 15 kilometres from the airport and a short drive to the popular tourist restaurant The Carnivore.

The hotel has 194 good standard rooms as well as 32 suites. All rooms are equipped with mini bar, satellite television, internet connection, electronic safe, hairdryer, bathrobes and air con. Rooms are carpeted, pleasantly decorated with soft lighting and have a sofa, writing desk and chair. There is 24 room service.
The Grand Regency is a freestanding, modern structure of whitewashed concrete pillars and solar glass rising twelve stories above Nairobi's lush Central park.
The hotel has a 4 restaurants offering a choice of local, Indian, Italian and French cuisine. There is also a brasserie and snacks can be ordered from the pool deck and bar.

The large lobby has a marble floor and high ceiling. The reception desk is to the right as you enter and the concierge desk and coffee shop is to the left. There is also a foreign exchange desk in the lobby. Straight ahead are steps leading to the hotel bar and main atrium. The public areas are offset by lush tropical foliage, abstract murals and mahogany and brass fittings.
